title: When trolls are trying to provoke you but they get their asses banned in 15 minutes after the game

replies.body: Can we stop with the god damn memes already!
No.

> [{quoted}](name=FLiQ Gr1d1ron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEEFOadQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-22T01:39:12.897+0000)
>
> No.

Congratz, you turned these forums into total garbage. Not surprising that Riot doesn't want to communicate with us.

Not having memes in "memes and games" wouldn't make sense.
it's like G and B without the balamce... wait, it's already like that.
I don't care if they are in there own post its when the front page or hot area of the boards is 80% of these stupid Gifs.
True, there should be a way to hide certain boards that you dont want to see. Hopefully in the future they will implement that.
http://media.giphy.com/media/qox1yTvzRLFUk/giphy.gif
http://media.giphy.com/media/qox1yTvzRLFUk/giphy.gif
Can we stop replying to these troll posts? This is the second gif post in a row where a White Night dragged scum to the top comment :\
http://media.giphy.com/media/qox1yTvzRLFUk/giphy.gif
who is we?
We are legion.
Why do you look at them? Theres a big fat picture next to them and they are tagged in 'Memes and games', look past them.
Because they vastly overcrowd other posts on the main page, and I already had to shovel through garbage to find anything, now we have even more.
http://media.giphy.com/media/qox1yTvzRLFUk/giphy.gif

No they don't. They are obvious, if you don't use common sense then...

http://cdn.yourepeat.com/media/gif/000/677/531/70259f3f6386ef2bd64f58530f546459.gif

DOOM ON YOU!
http://www.fybertech.com/4get/13635645522576.gif
Welcome to the Memes and Games board, where we post... memes and games.
Go away scrub
http://media.giphy.com/media/qox1yTvzRLFUk/giphy.gif
how can u tell if they got banned?

> [{quoted}](name=aaronautumn,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEEFOadQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-22T01:31:37.938+0000)
>
> how can u tell if they got banned?

I believe you get a notification if they do, I think I read that in the red post.

I'll assume it's to alleviate the public opinion that "Reports don't do anything".

> [{quoted}](name=Postal Badger,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEEFOadQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-22T01:36:12.406+0000)
>
> I believe you get a notification if they do, I think I read that in the red post.
> 
> I'll assume it's to alleviate the public opinion that "Reports don't do anything".

Then apparently it doesn't work, since I've NEVER received such notification
It came out two days ago do your research scrub

> [{quoted}](name=aaronautumn,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEEFOadQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-22T01:31:37.938+0000)
>
> how can u tell if they got banned?

With the new report & ban system :3

Banned 15 minutes after the game? You're one of those who mashes the report button with a fancy little message in there and everything, and thinks it does something lol. Well, at least some still believe in fairy tales.

> [{quoted}](name=big stiny,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEEFOadQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-22T11:01:56.152+0000)
>
> Banned 15 minutes after the game? You're one of those who mashes the report button with a fancy little message in there and everything, and thinks it does something lol. Well, at least some still believe in fairy tales.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/798/789/732.gif

the system is on NA only so you can still troll on the other servers without mercy
and without dem bans

Well, some guy was RAGING at our team earlier today. He was BMing in all chat and being super toxic. Everyone reported him, and a few minutes later I received a system message telling me something to the effect:

"Thanks to the reports from you and your peers, the Tribunal has punished the reported player according to their actions."

So yes, it's within 15 minutes and it actually works.
http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130110184236/lionking/images/2/27/I'm_surrounded_by_idiots.gif
Well ya know if you keep up with the news then you would know that the ban system has been updated and if you report someone and they are punished then you receive a notification.
